knimeNode.name: FeatureCountsMerger
knimeNode.shortDescription: The FeatureCountsMerger can be used to merge the results of multiple feature count runs.

fullDescription.intro:
The FeatureCountsMerger can be used to merge the results of multiple feature count runs.
The node takes as input a list of feature count files and returns a table with the merged counts.
fullDescription.option: Set the path to the folder where the merged file should be stored.
